title: Leagues Ranking Systems Keep Good Players In Bronze......
body:
Let me start off by saying that I'm sorry when it looks like i just start whining......But I have to get this off my chest.

What would the NFL look like if they let the Superbowl winners, or playoff participants Have first rights on draft picks, instead of last.......This is basically what League does with the restart of their seasons. I have been stuck in bronze ever since i started playing. Very late Season 2. I was a Complete noob. Not very much experience with moba's. So i thought id have some fun and try out ranked play, Not knowing that it was going to ruin my ranking for my account for THE REST OF MY LIFE. I know everyone's solution to this is to make a new account, and start over to secure a better ranked score. This to me is just a Cheat. 

I have some pride when I put my Username in. So I have been unwilling to start a new account under some false identity... So now since i have this stupid pride.....Every new season a fresh start....except, that since i was bronze when I dicked around as a total noob. I have been stuck in bronze with other bronze league trolls, feeders,Jerk-offs. I'm stuck with the other kids who are attempting ranked for the first time, or dumb enough to use a champ in ranked for the very first time, hoping they will destroy the other team on pure luck....I know the common response will be that I'm just bronze league, don't have the skill or whatever you want to call it to move to silver, gold..or higher.

 I have a vast knowledge of the champions of league. I own almost 100 purely earning them from my play. I know every skill of every champion i play against. But I'm stuck with the noobs in bronze. I have gone through seasons of kids who still think its a good idea to take Kat for first pick.....when we all know that leaves the enemy team to choose 5 champs with stuns, pop-ups, and cc of all kind to make sure that kat will do NOTHING to them.... 

If league were to do a true restart on the ranked play...make the provisional 20 matches idc....I'm sick of playing these games just to have this 15 year old kids join my ranked match when they only have 20 minutes before bed time...and force another loss on my already frustrating record. I know there are thousands of other players that feel the same as me. Its just sad to see that Riot turns a deaf ear to bronze league players...I know the pro's are your go too guys and all....but does that mean riot thinks I'm not worthwhile in the League Family? Have i not bought enough skins to help support the game I love? Are my 7 rune pages meaningless unless I win a championship? 

Please Riot, I'm stuck in Elo Hell and no matter how hard I try or how good i get....I cant play for the other 4 guys on my team every game....the ranking system might be fine for a brand new player....or a player who did great the previous season. But for players like myself, who shouldn't be stuck in bronze. It is a Joke. Thanks for letting me vent some frustration out on this forum. I know that it wont really be seen by any Riot people, and wont be taken seriously by anyone else. But Ive been loyal to the League ever since i first played a match years ago.....and have not been rewarded. (oh except you did give me a free trynd skin for being a "nice" summoner) ( which i didn't really earn because i didn't have internet for about 8 months,so while i was gone you just thought i was being nice lol)

So you better make that 10% count for a lot.

I'll admit I have a bit of a defeatists attitude sometimes and It does cost me some wins sometimes but I'd say at least 80% of my games I try my absolutely hardest and do my best to the best of my abilities.
I might make mistakes.
But whats the fun in playing like a bitch?
Maybe I like playing exhaust ignite irelia and jax and crushing my lane.
Maybe I get caught trying to all in and die.
Shit happens.
But I don't go on tilt until I know the game is absolutely over and there's nothing I can do to win.

Some games are just like that, learning to accept that helps you climb quicker.
Some games are wins some games are losses.
some games are toss ups.

Most games are easy to figure out how they'll play out by the 15 minute mark though.


Personally I usually try to 20s to not waste anyones time with an obvious loss.
But I have the mindset of someone who doesn't like wasting time even if its a loss so I try to be quick about my deicisions and not indecisive.
Questioning everything you do or someone else does only breeds negativity or even worse, losses.
